196e6c87f76a.title: Great article and thank you for the work it took to put it all together.

paragraphs.text: Great article and thank you for the work it took to put it all together. I “farm” or garden on small city lot. While some will be able to monetize I fear most won’t. Salads and kale are not the future of food but they are the entry for the urban entrepenuer. Some will be successful and that is great. Yet, I really don’t think that should be the point…

af7f1b8fe38b.title: A very through article that points out the elephant in the room: how do you feed the world when…

paragraphs.text: A very through article that points out the elephant in the room: how do you feed the world when organic and technological improvements seem to have an upper limit without just taking up as much room as their traditional farming brethren? For all that they tout about the benefits of organic farming, that to me is the biggest question: how do you scale…
